prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: First published in 1900, The Wither-Wane was a student newspaper of Wytheville High School. Wytheville High School was built in the late 1880s and opened in 1890. It was razed in November 1971, superseded by George Wythe High School.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Issues include: 21 November 1938; 4 December 1939; June 1944, souvenir edition; 26 March 1945; 25 February 1946; 29 April 1946; 28 October 1946; 2 December 1946; 16 December 1946; 17 February 1946 (2 copies); 17 march 1946; 7 April 1946; May 1946.
